title: How do I create a contact on my G730? How do I assign a photo to a contact?
answer:
**Creating a contact **Touch **Contacts** then ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=37918) , choose where you want to save the contact, enter the contact details, and touch **SAVE**. 

 **Assigning a photo to a contact** 
 Go to **Contacts** and touch a contact to display the contact details. Touch the contact photo area then **Take photo**, **Choose from preset**, or **Choose photo from Gallery.** 

 <o:p></o:p>
